tgt_original: evaṃ vidhividhānena kuryād bandhabandhanamuktakam || 4 ||  mātā vā yadi vā bhaginī putrī vā bāndhavī bhāryā vai iti pañca yoginyo  mātrādivatsnigdhatvāt |
ābhiḥ sārdhaṃ baddhānsuṣṭhu muktakaṃ mokṣaṃ kuryāt || 4 ||
ācāryamūrtimā dhāya pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmi sādhakaḥ || 5 ||  tataḥ sidhyanti mantrā iti devatāḥ |
